text: Bachman S, Brown Mm (2024). LCr: LCr: Generate minimal Least Concern Red List assessments. R package version 0.1.0, https://stevenpbachman.github.io/LCr/, https://github.com/stevenpbachman/LCr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {LCr: LCr: Generate minimal Least Concern Red List assessments},   author = {Steven Bachman and Matilda m.brown2@kew.org Brown},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0, https://stevenpbachman.github.io/LCr/},   url = {https://github.com/stevenpbachman/LCr}, }

title: LCr: Generate minimal Least Concern Red List assessments
text: Generate minimal documentation species expected Least Concern (see IUCN Red List. Submit IUCN Red List via SIS Connect (registration needed)

title: LCr: Generate minimal Least Concern Red List assessments
text: yet CRAN, can install development version GitHub :

title: LCr: Generate minimal Least Concern Red List assessments
text: workflow broken several steps step can run independently: name_search_gbif name_search_powo tp check name status taxonomic name backbones occs_gbif gather occurrence records GBIF occs_clean clean occurrence data sis_zip generate zip SIS csv datafiles Function allow single species multiple species dataframe supplied

title: LCr: Generate minimal Least Concern Red List assessments
code: library(LCr) ## check a name against GBIF, Kew Names Matching Service and Plants of the World Online name_search_gbif("Poa annua L.") #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   searchName   usageKey scientificName status   rank    confidence #>   <chr>           <int> <chr>          <chr>    <chr>        <int> #> 1 Poa annua L.  2704179 Poa annua L.   ACCEPTED SPECIES        100  #etc...

what: Query taxon name against GBIF backbone — name_search_gbif
title: Query taxon name against GBIF backbone — name_search_gbif
text: Queries taxon name GBIF names backbone. Simple wrapper around rgbif `name_backbone_verbose` function.

title: Query taxon name against GBIF backbone — name_search_gbif
code: name_search_gbif(   name,   species_rank = TRUE,   match = "single",   gbif_tax_stat = "any" )

title: Query taxon name against GBIF backbone — name_search_gbif
text: name (character) taxon name species_rank (character) Default TRUE returns matches species level, otherwise FALSE returns taxonomic rank match (character) Controls output search. Use `single` force single match result highest confidence `` return possible matches sorted order confidence gbif_tax_stat (character) Default `` provides taxonomic matches, otherwise `accepted` returns accepted names according GBIF

title: Query taxon name against GBIF backbone — name_search_gbif
text: Returns data frame initial search term matching name(s)

title: Query taxon name against GBIF backbone — name_search_gbif
code: name_search_gbif("Poa annua L.") #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   searchName   usageKey scientificName status   rank    confidence #>   <chr>           <int> <chr>          <chr>    <chr>        <int> #> 1 Poa annua L.  2704179 Poa annua L.   ACCEPTED SPECIES        100

title: Query taxon name against POWO (Plants of the World Online) backbone — name_search_powo

text: Returns data frame initial search term matching name(s)
